Text:
Won't bother downing it, may stop watching NXT altogther.

But good man Den, for sourcing out an HDTV version for those who enjoy the show and may feel gutted with previous version.

After negative comments, there's many who'd say get lost then, in so many words while having a Shirley Temple and wouldn't bother.

Shows integrity, fibre and that you upload for the right reasons.

Great stuff matey.

Peace.  : )
